page.title: 16Tourist Spots at Two Bridges
page.content:
There are not many tourist spots in the area exept for a few places, these being Two Bridges, Crockern Tor, Wistman's Wood and around the Cherry Brook Hotel.
At Two Bridges there is a Hotel and a Restaurant with a pleasant picnic area outside beside the West Dart River.
Crockern Tor is associated with the ancient Tinners or Stanners. The Tor is well known because it was the meeting place of the Stannery Parliament and is very close to the road.
Below Crockern Tor is the Cherry Broock Hotel this is very a small place,it is on the very road where the hairy hands struck.
